title: 05/10/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 05/10/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin is ready to welcome the Knicks back into relevancy and why it finally feels different for the first time in years. With all of the rumors about where Aaron Rodgers could end up, he explains why 1 destination is a bad fit and another makes a lot of sense. He also tells you why he was wrong about LeBron James and right about Kirk Cousins. Plus, Colin talks to Packers WR Davante Adams to find out what he knows about Rodgers’ unhappiness in Green Bay.  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
